name: Chipotle Veggie Burger Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Veggie burger lovers, we’ve got you! With 22g of protein (when prepared), 5g of fibre, and a smoky Tex-Mex flavour, we’ve created the perfect veggie burger blend, unlike anything else out there. Packed with good food—no mystery ingredients or unnecessary additives here—Chipotle Veggie Burgers are incredibly delicious. Just mix the blend with sweet potato, water, and a little oil to form burger patties that stand up to the grill.
